actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 for the purpose of improving public park and other public recreational facilities by authorizing donations of Federal surplus supplies and equipment to State and local public recreational agencies.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act, the donations of Federal surplus supplies and equipment to State and local public recreational agencies to improve public park and recreational facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 for the purpose of improving public park and other public recreational facilities by authorizing donations of Federal surplus supplies and equipment to State and local public recreational agencies.
